description: The ``AWS::ApiGateway::BasePathMapping`` resource creates a base path that clients who call your API must use in the invocation URL.

BasePath.description: The base path name that callers of the API must provide as part of the URL after the domain name.

DomainName.description: The domain name of the BasePathMapping resource to be described.

RestApiId.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

Stage.description: The name of the associated stage.
